skill.s1.name: Howling Wind
skill.s1.description: Deals [color=#7fe82a][b]{skill_data} ATK[/b][/color] as [color=#7fe82a][b]Wind DMG[/b][/color] to 1 enemy 4 times, with a [color=#7fe82a][b]{skill_data}[/b][/color] base chance to inflict [color=#7fe82a][b][i]Winded[/i][/b][/color] for 2 turns.
skill.s2.name: Elegant Storm
skill.s2.description: Deals [color=#7fe82a][b]{skill_data} ATK[/b][/color] as [color=#7fe82a][b]Wind DMG[/b][/color] to all enemies 3 times.
When attacking enemies there is a (Number of enemies * [color=#7fe82a][b]{skill_data}[/b][/color]) base chance to gain [color=#4f5bec][b][Resolve][/b][/color]
skill.s3.name: Shadowless Thrust
skill.s3.description: Deals [color=#7fe82a][b]{skill_data} ATK[/b][/color] as [color=#7fe82a][b]Wind DMG[/b][/color] to 1 enemy 3 times.

When Fleuret has not less than 3 stacks of [color=#4f5bec][b][Resolve][/b][/color] deals 1 additional hit of damage and increases [color=#7fe82a][b]CRIT Rate[/b][/color] by [color=#7fe82a][b]20%[/b][/color].
skill.hl.name: HIGHLIGHT
skill.hl.description: Deals [color=#7fe82a][b]{skill_data} ATK[/b][/color] as [color=#7fe82a][b]Wind DMG[/b][/color] to 1 enemy 3 times, when using this skill, if Fleuret has 3 or more stacks of [color=#4f5bec][b][Resolve][/b][/color], deals 1 additional hit of damage.
skill.p1.name: Focus
skill.p1.description: When using [ref=s3][color=#e7b77b][b][u][Shadowless Thrust][/u][/b][/color][/ref] to enemy inflicted with [color=#7fe82a][b][i]Winded[/i][/b][/color], there is a [color=#7fe82a][b]{skill_data}[/b][/color] fixed chance to deal 1 additional hit of damage.
skill.p2.name: Repressed
skill.p2.description: At the end of turn, there is a [color=#7fe82a][b]{skill_data}[/b][/color] fixed chance to gain 1 stack of [color=#4f5bec][b][Resolve][/b][/color].
awareness.a0.name: Parry Defense
awareness.a0.description: When dealing a hit of damage with a skill, there is a [color=#7fe82a][b]40%[/b][/color] fixed chance to gain 1 stack of [color=#4f5bec][b][Resolve][/b][/color], which increases [color=#7fe82a][b]ATK[/b][/color] by [color=#7fe82a][b]7%[/b][/color] and [color=#7fe82a][b]SPD[/b][/color] by [color=#7fe82a][b]4[/b][/color] for 2 turns, up to 3 stacks.
awareness.a1.name: Taking the Steel
awareness.a1.description: Increase the cap of [color=#4f5bec][b][Resolve][/b][/color] to 5 stacks.
Each stack of [color=#4f5bec][b][Resolve][/b][/color] increases own [color=#7fe82a][b]CRIT Rate[/b][/color] by [color=#7fe82a][b]4%[/b][/color].
awareness.a2.name: Sparring
awareness.a2.description: [ref=s1][color=#e7b77b][b][u][Howling Wind][/u][/b][/color][/ref] [color=#7fe82a][b]Lv. +3[/b][/color], up to a maximum of [color=#7fe82a][b]Lv. 15[/b][/color].
[ref=s2][color=#e7b77b][b][u][Elegant Storm][/u][/b][/color][/ref] [color=#7fe82a][b]Lv. +3[/b][/color], up to a maximum of [color=#7fe82a][b]Lv. 15[/b][/color].
awareness.a3.name: Changing Steps
awareness.a3.description: When attacked by enemies, there is a [color=#7fe82a][b]12%[/b][/color] fixed chance to dodge this attack.
awareness.a4.name: Vulnerability Aimed
awareness.a4.description: [ref=s3][color=#e7b77b][b][u][Shadowless Thrust][/u][/b][/color][/ref] [color=#7fe82a][b]Lv. +3[/b][/color], up to a maximum of [color=#7fe82a][b]Lv. 15[/b][/color].
[ref=hl][color=#e7b77b][b][u][Combat Skills][/u][/b][/color][/ref] [color=#7fe82a][b]Lv. +3[/b][/color], up to a maximum of [color=#7fe82a][b]Lv. 15[/b][/color].
awareness.a5.name: Hidden Offense
awareness.a5.description: [ref=hl][color=#e7b77b][b][u][HIGHLIGHT][/u][/b][/color][/ref] Effect Boost: When Fleuret has 3 or more stacks of [color=#4f5bec][b][Resolve][/b][/color], deal 1 additional hit of damage and there is a [color=#7fe82a][b]100%[/b][/color] base chance to inflict [color=#7fe82a][b][i]Winded[/i][/b][/color].
awareness.a6.name: Precise Attack
awareness.a6.description: Increase the fixed chance to gain [color=#4f5bec][b][Resolve][/b][/color] by [color=#7fe82a][b]20%[/b][/color].

When [color=#4f5bec][b][Resolve][/b][/color] is at maxed stacks, [ref=s1][color=#e7b77b][b][u][Howling Wind][/u][/b][/color][/ref], [ref=s2][color=#e7b77b][b][u][Elegant Storm][/u][/b][/color][/ref] and [ref=s3][color=#e7b77b][b][u][Shadowless Thrust][/u][/b][/color][/ref] additionally deal 1 hit of damage.
